product_name: CliniqueAlmost Powder Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 18 Foundation
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Almost Powder Makeup SPF 18 Foundation is a mineral-enriched, long-wearing pressed powder makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesCoverage: SheerFinish: Matte, NaturalA natural, perfecting 'no-makeup' powder makeup.Mineral-enriched, long-wear powder formula protects with SPF.It's so lightweight, you'll never even feel it.So foolproof, you can apply it with a sponge, a brush - and almost with your eyes closed.Broad spectrum SPF 18 protects skin.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2160688How To UseApply powder with a sponge or brush for a fresh, natural look. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup RemoverIngredientsTalc, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Silica, Squalane, Boron Nitride, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Cetyl Caprylate, Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Methicone, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Palmitoyl Glutamate, Sodium Palmitoyl Sarcosinate, Palmitoyl Proline, Alumina, Tocopherol, Palmitic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Tin Oxide, Sodium Dehydroacetate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Such an easy to use product
reviews.comments: I got this as a Diamond Member gift. I first used toner, facial oil, SPF, and then used a fluffy brush to apply. My skin is so smooth, matte, and my dark spots are covered excellently. Usually a glowy over matte girl, but this might change me!

reviews.headline: Ruined something good
reviews.comments: I have been using this foundation powder since it came out over 10 years ago and I just went to buy a new one and something was changed! It used to be more of a creamy powder with good and buildable coverage, now it is extremely loose powder and sheer almost no coverage and goes on splotchy! It barely even goes on my brush it just turns in to a loose powdery mess on the compact! So disappointing! My favorite foundation powder that worked so well for so long has been ruined! Now I have to start over and try to find something new. I think I will try bare minerals pressed foundation powder and hope it works for me.

reviews.headline: Love this foundation
reviews.comments: Like the powder then the liquid.

reviews.headline: Will definitely purchase again
reviews.comments: I've been using powder foundation for years and have tried a few different brands. This is so far my favorite.  Goes on nicely and has the perfect amount of coverage for me.

reviews.headline: This is one of regular products
reviews.comments: I've been using this for years and still love it.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product!  It goes on smoothly and looks so natural!  I will buy this again!

reviews.headline: I have been buying it for many years.
reviews.comments: It is a very good powder foundation, which I use it over Clinique liquid foundation and have been for many, many years.

reviews.headline: My everyday product
reviews.comments: I love this powder. I use it everyday. It is lightweight and looks natural. I love that it blurs my red spots. It lasts me all day and overall great product!

reviews.headline: Have been buying it for years
reviews.comments: Literally have been buying it for years and years and love it. Lightweight, with good coverage. Helps with redness and shine. A go to for me all the time

reviews.headline: Purchase again
reviews.comments: This is my favorite for 10yrs. I am 55 and this just floats over lines and wrinkles.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Just what I was looking for.

reviews.headline: My opinion
reviews.comments: I bought this profuct a couple months ago but even though I like to product I find that it breaks very easily. Recently I went to use the powder and the whole thing was broken. I had to press the product back together for it to work. Genuinely upset taht this happened.

reviews.headline: Love it definitely recommend
reviews.comments: I really do love this powder. it's versatile so I can use it alone or as a setting powder. I'm a NC 35 in Mac or a nyx mocha and surprisingly the deep powder doesn't wash me out or make me ashey. The price was a challenge but it's lasted me 8 months for almost daily use and it's not empty yet. it has a nice skin lifke finish also.

reviews.headline: Best powder I've ever used.
reviews.comments:
I'm 45, and a minimal makeup person. I have dry, mature skin with some fine lines and a few deeper wrinkles. 

Over the years I have tried several powders; the hyped Laura Mercier, Lancôme, Tillbury, MAC, to name a few. They always either desiccated my skin, clung to hairs and dry patches, left me feeling tight, ended up looking cakey. Really, I feel the same about most liquid foundations I've tried, too, with a few rare exceptions. 

I just want something natural, easy, long wearing and most importantly, something that plays well with sunscreen. I bought this powder on a whim with the lowest possible expectations. 

I love it. I bought back ups. Easy to apply rolling it on with the provided sponge. Goes on super well over sunscreen or moisturizer. Doesn't suck all the moisture from my skin, doesn't cling to fine hairs, settle in fine lines, doesn't transfer onto clothing. The look it provides is a smoothed, blurred skin tone - very natural. I have some redness, a few freckles, some scars that are a different color, some capillaries, and a few sunspots. This powder just ties everything together and gives my skin a more even appearance. I spray a little humectant toner over the the top to hydrate the finish and I'm good to go. Lasts all day. The compact will last a year using it every day, which helps with the high price. It's easy to carry with you, no mess, no brush needed. 

Apparently there are a lot of silicones and emollients in the formula which helps so much to make this not a drying powder. I love it so much. I threw away my other coverage products. I can't imagine anything working better than this.

reviews.headline: I would recommend
reviews.comments: Goes on easy and gives a natural even color.

reviews.headline: i love it!
reviews.comments: im 20 and i swear by this powder, you can use it to set your makeup or just use it by itself both will suffice. this powder does not look cakey either! occasionally itll give me a powedery look but, it is powder so cant be picky a setting spray will fix if

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: Made my face breakout when I have never had this problem. I went in to get my regular foundation and was talked into trying this.

reviews.headline: My Favorite
reviews.comments: Easy to use and my go to powder foundation. The Lightest shade, fair matches my skin tone perfectly. Beautiful compact, product always delivers. Happiness. ☺️

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Feels like you're wearing nothing

reviews.headline: Goes on great
reviews.comments: Great product

media.headline: I love the powder in deep it matches my skin perfect.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've spent hundreds of dollars on foundations and powders for my ever changing face. The older I get my face seems to change texture. I can't wear foundation of any kind with out it wearing off my face in an oil slick causing break outs. Or the colors are never a match. Powders, expensive and generic make my face feel tight and uncomfortable, again not providing a good color match.  I have large pores, redness all over and am acne prone in my T-Zone area.  A co-worker was wearing the Almost powder by Clinic. Her face was glowing after a long shift at work. Her makeup flawless. She told me to give Clinic a try. The best decision I've made. You can apply this liberally for a lightweight coverage or you can build with this to get medium to full coverage.  All the redness in my face was covered perfectly. Acne has deminished and no new breakouts. The color match is perfect. It feels light weight with out the the tighness of a powder but finishes like a foundation through out the day.  It's price point may be higher than drug store. I'd say save the money you'd spend on drug store foundations and powders and get this instead.  Clinic almost powder will make me feel confident in the summer.
faceoff_positive.headline: By far the best face powder I've used

faceoff_negative.comments: I do not understand Clinique at all!! It is so frustrating for a company to change a foundation, a powder, that it knows from reviews that IS ABSOLUTELY WORKING for those who use it! The coverage, look and feel is now different than what it used to be because you took out the SPF15 that was in the product. HOWEVER...You might check your stores as many I went to in my local area have the samples to try the product at the counter, say the SPF! I used to love the coverage of this powder as I typcially and almost exclusively use powder as my foundation at the age of 51! Please change this back to the way it was!!
faceoff_negative.headline: WHY DID YOU CHANGE SOMETHING THAT WAS WORKING??
